trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_TALK_ACTOR_02<tab>You wish for <var 29 EA02 /var> to unlearn an ability? Very well, if you would be so kind as to specify the undesired ability...
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_001_Q1<tab>Are you certain you wish for your race chocobo to unlearn <var 28 ((ChocoboRaceAbility)) E80301 /var>?
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_001_DONE<tab>And with that, the process is complete. I pray this meets with your satisfaction.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_TALK_ACTOR<tab>You wish for your race chocobo to unlearn an ability? Very well, if you would be so kind as to specify the undesired ability...
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_001_01<tab>No, this cannot be right, can it? According to my records, you do not even have a registered race chocobo.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_001_02<tab>Race chocobos cannot unlearn abilities until they have been officially registered.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_002_01<tab>You did remember to bring a bottle of lethe water, did you not? If not, I fear we cannot proceed.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_002_02<tab>Abilities cannot be unlearned without lethe water, which can be purchased from the tack & feed trader at the race counter.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_003_01<tab>Hm. So far as I can tell, your race chocobo possesses no abilities which can be unlearned.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_003_02<tab>Hereditary abilities are permanent. Only acquired abilities may be unlearned.
